definition: to throw/to cast/left-slanting downward brush stroke (calligraphy)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.chinese: 左撇子科学家其实并不少见。

sentences.english: I've always believed that aggressive southpaws are able to put hands on Marquez.
sentences.chinese: 我一直认为咄咄逼人的左撇子拳手能够击中马奎兹。

sentences.english: I'm going to give you some facts and figures about left-handedness.
sentences.chinese: 我要列举一些事实和数据关于左撇子。

sentences.english: The southpaw needed a special glove.
sentences.chinese: 这个左撇子需要特制的手套。

sentences.english: Then they began to talk about left- handedness and right- handedness.
sentences.chinese: 然后他们开始谈论左撇子和右撇子。

sentences.english: Left-handers are believed to reach puberty 4 to 5 months after right-handers.
sentences.chinese: 左撇子人的青春期会比右撇子晚来4到5个月。

sentences.english: Do right-handed people and left-handed people have different personalities?
sentences.chinese: 用右手的人和左撇子性格上有差异吗？

sentences.english: Claiming the nation's richest man among their number is a source of considerable pride for America's society of southpaws.
sentences.chinese: 包括美国第一首富在内，是美国左撇子最引以为豪的。

sentences.english: THE BOTTOM LINE Most studies have found that being left-handed does not increase the risk of migraines.
sentences.chinese: 下面联接到更多发现左撇子不增加偏头痛风险的研究。

sentences.english: And they are often associated with clumsiness and awkwardness.
sentences.chinese: 人们还经常把左撇子和笨拙联系起来。

sentences.english: If you are left-handed, open doors with your right hand.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是左撇子，用右手开门。

sentences.english: Quintana is a crafty southpaw with good skills and is by no means a walk - over.
sentences.chinese: 昆塔纳是个技术出色的狡猾的左撇子，绝非等闲之辈。

sentences.english: It appears to me that lefties are more creative than their right-handed fellow humans.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得左撇子似乎比用惯右手的人更富有创造性。

sentences.english: And left-foot kickers to their right.
sentences.chinese: 而左撇子会将球往右边踢。

definition: to wear a watch/a homophone for 代表 used to avoid Internet censorship in the PRC
see 鬥雞眼|斗鸡眼[dou4 ji1 yan3]
